data.title: Working at BD in Belgium, Netherlands and Luxembourg
data.meta_description: BD in BeNeLux represents 1,200 associates in Belgium, the Netherlands and Luxembourg.
data.text:
Temse is where The BD European Distribution Center is located. This highly automated logistics campus operates around the clock.

OLEN—BELGIUM

Our Distribution Center in Olen guarantees the EMEA deliveries of all products from the BD Interventional segment. Every year, more than half a million customers' orders are sent, mainly to hospitals and pharmacists, but also to other BD distribution centers and wholesalers.

VIANEN—NETHERLANDS

In Vianen we have focused on the co-sharing idea thanks to flexible desks and all the office commodities available. Here you can share thoughts, space and information with your colleagues.

DRACHTEN—NETHERLANDS

Drachten is our hub for production and R&D. Here we produce our highest-quality laboratory automation solutions that are shipped and installed in laboratories all over the world. Every day more than 150 hardware, software and systems Engineers use the latest technologies to work on innovative solutions, collaborating with development teams in France, Ireland, Canada and the US. In our labs, we test the latest developments and technologies on the basis of test samples, containing the same organisms as in real patient samples from the human body. Thanks to the Training Center, we can provide training for our associates to ensure that they have the right knowledge to help BD's customers get the most out of our solutions.

LUXEMBOURG

Luxembourg is the location of BD's EMEA Treasury Department. Here you can excel in Finance and work with us on cash management, optimizing capital structure, managing bank relationships and risk management.
